title: Wouldnt it make more sense if Tristana and Caitlyn switched passives?
body:
I mean... Caitlyn is supposed to be a sniper, Tristana is supposed to be a Gunner. 

Snipers are supposed to shoot from a very long distance and make every shot count.
Gunners Shoot and shoot and shoot until they dont find anything else to shoot at. 


Yet, Tristana gets Attack range when she gets stronger, Caitlyn gets a bonus when she shoots alot...

Shouldnt it be exactly the other way around, with Tristana getting a stronger hit after getting into a shooting frenzy, and Caitlyn getting more range as the game goes on?

uh, no it really wouldn't.

Tristana's shoot and shoot and shoot, as you called it, comes from her Q, not her passive.

Caitlyn's passive fits her perfectly. What does a sharpshooter want to hit? A headshot. They want precision. Caitlyn's sniper fantasy is there from the start with her high base range. If you switched passives, suddenly she would need a really low base range in order to compensate. And tristana would need an increase in base range because at 550 range, with her kit, there wouldnt be much reason to pick her.
